title: Textile, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, cotton (lining)
Technique: plain compound satin
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson
description: Gift cloth, or fukusa, with woven pattern of dragons in roundels and flowers arranged in horizontal bands on a fret ground. In shades of rose, blue, green, and gray with details in silvered paper. Lined with loosely woven cotton cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread, cotton (lining)
Technique: plain compound satin. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson. 1941-31-340.
